member.name: M:InternshippClass.WebApi.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Getting weather forecast for today + 7 days ahead for a specific location
member.param: In range -90 and 90. For example: latitude for Brasov is 45.75
In range -180 and 180. For example: longitude for Brasov is 25.3333
